courses.advice_detail_en: Chilly conditions. Long sleeves and tights or light layering are recommended. Light breeze with little impact on running. Surface is dry with low risk of slipping. Air quality is moderate. Consider a mask if you are sensitive to fine dust. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.
